meanings.definition: A type of slime mold that typically forms fruiting bodies containing spores.
meanings.sent1: The myxomycete slowly spread across the forest floor, forming small fruiting bodies.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the behavior of myxomycetes to understand their life cycle.
meanings.sent3: The myxomycete decided to throw a party in its fruiting body, inviting all its spore friends.
meanings.sent4: The myxomycete's fruiting body stood tall like a miniature city, bustling with spores.
meanings.sent5: As I walked through the woods, I stumbled upon a myxomycete, its fruiting body a vibrant orange against the green moss.

meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of myxomycetes.
meanings.sent1: The scientist made a myxomycete discovery that changed the field of biology.
meanings.sent2: Her research focused on the unique characteristics of myxomycete behavior.
meanings.sent3: The myxomycete party was the most adjective event of the year, with spores dancing all night.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a myxomycete maze, full of twists and turns that led to new ideas.
meanings.sent5: The myxomycete landscape was painted in vibrant colors, each hue representing a different characteristic of the slime mold.
